data.title: Pinky and the Brain
data.meta_description: Two hilariously popular laboratory mice star in their own animated comedy spin-off--PINKY AND THE BRAIN--as they take on the modern world in an intellâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Das Mouse

Pinky (series star Rob Paulsen) and The Brain (series star Maurice LaMarche) go undersea in a submarine to find the key ingredient for a hypnotic pancake batter.

20 min Â· Sep 8, 1995 TV-Y

EPISODE 2

Of Mouse and Man

The Brain schemes to collect workmen's compensation to fund another plan to take over the world in "Of Mouse and Man."

20 min Â· Sep 9, 1995 TV-Y7

EPISODE 3

Tokyo Grows / That Smarts / Brainstem!

In "Tokyo Grows," during the 1950s, The Brain creates monsters to scare Tokyo and then rescue it. Later, in "That Smarts," The Brain decides that the key to his success is to make Pinky as smart as he is. Finally, in "Brainstem!" Pinky and The Brain sing about the parts of the brain.

21 min Â· Sep 16, 1995 TV-Y7

EPISODE 4

Pinky & the Fog / Where No Mouse Has Gone Before / Cheese Roll Call

In the 1930s, The Brain poses as The Fog and plans to broadcast his hypnotic voice over the radio in "Pinky and the Fog." Then, Pinky and The Brain alter the inscription on a space probe to go "Where No Mouse Has Gone Before." Later, in "Cheese Roll Call," Pinky sings about cheeses.

20 min Â· Nov 4, 1995 TV-Y7
